45 #include <rviz/ogre_helpers/point_cloud.h>

47 namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
48 {
49 typedef std::vector<rviz::PointCloud::Point> VPoint;
50 typedef std::vector<VPoint> VVPoint;
51 
52 OcTreeRender::OcTreeRender(const std::shared_ptr<const octomap::OcTree>& octree,
53  OctreeVoxelRenderMode octree_voxel_rendering, OctreeVoxelColorMode octree_color_mode,
54  std::size_t max_octree_depth, Ogre::SceneNode* parent_node)
55  : octree_(octree), colorFactor_(0.8)
56 {
57  if (!max_octree_depth)
58  {
59  octree_depth_ = octree->getTreeDepth();
60  }
61  else
62  {
63  octree_depth_ = std::min(max_octree_depth, (std::size_t)octree->getTreeDepth());
64  }
65 
66  scene_node_ = parent_node->createChildSceneNode();
67 
68  cloud_.resize(octree_depth_);
69 
70  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < octree_depth_; ++i)
71  {
72  std::stringstream sname;
73  sname << "PointCloud Nr." << i;
74  cloud_[i] = new rviz::PointCloud();
75  cloud_[i]->setName(sname.str());
76  cloud_[i]->setRenderMode(rviz::PointCloud::RM_BOXES);
77  scene_node_->attachObject(cloud_[i]);
78  }
79 
80  octreeDecoding(octree, octree_voxel_rendering, octree_color_mode);
81 }
82 
83 OcTreeRender::~OcTreeRender()
84 {
85  scene_node_->detachAllObjects();
86 
87  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < octree_depth_; ++i)
88  {
89  delete cloud_[i];
90  }
91 }
92 
93 void OcTreeRender::setPosition(const Ogre::Vector3& position)
94 {
95  scene_node_->setPosition(position);
96 }
97 
98 void moveit_rviz_plugin::OcTreeRender::setOrientation(const Ogre::Quaternion& orientation)
99 {
100  scene_node_->setOrientation(orientation);
101 }
102 
103 // method taken from octomap_server package
104 void OcTreeRender::setColor(double z_pos, double min_z, double max_z, double color_factor,
105  rviz::PointCloud::Point* point)
106 {
107  int i;
108  double m, n, f;
109 
110  double s = 1.0;
111  double v = 1.0;
112 
113  double h = (1.0 - std::min(std::max((z_pos - min_z) / (max_z - min_z), 0.0), 1.0)) * color_factor;
114 
115  h -= floor(h);
116  h *= 6;
117  i = floor(h);
118  f = h - i;
119  if (!(i & 1))
120  f = 1 - f; // if i is even
121  m = v * (1 - s);
122  n = v * (1 - s * f);
123 
124  switch (i)
125  {
126  case 6:
127  case 0:
128  point->setColor(v, n, m);
129  break;
130  case 1:
131  point->setColor(n, v, m);
132  break;
133  case 2:
134  point->setColor(m, v, n);
135  break;
136  case 3:
137  point->setColor(m, n, v);
138  break;
139  case 4:
140  point->setColor(n, m, v);
141  break;
142  case 5:
143  point->setColor(v, m, n);
144  break;
145  default:
146  point->setColor(1, 0.5, 0.5);
147  break;
148  }
149 }
150 
151 void OcTreeRender::octreeDecoding(const std::shared_ptr<const octomap::OcTree>& octree,
152  OctreeVoxelRenderMode octree_voxel_rendering, OctreeVoxelColorMode octree_color_mode)
153 {
154  VVPoint point_buf;
155  point_buf.resize(octree_depth_);
156 
157  // get dimensions of octree
158  double min_x, min_y, min_z, max_x, max_y, max_z;
159  octree->getMetricMin(min_x, min_y, min_z);
160  octree->getMetricMax(max_x, max_y, max_z);
161 
162  unsigned int render_mode_mask = static_cast<unsigned int>(octree_voxel_rendering);
163 
164  size_t point_count = 0;
165  {
166  int step_size = 1 << (octree->getTreeDepth() - octree_depth_); // for pruning of occluded voxels
167 
168  // traverse all leafs in the tree:
169  for (octomap::OcTree::iterator it = octree->begin(octree_depth_), end = octree->end(); it != end; ++it)
170  {
171  bool display_voxel = false;
172 
173  // the left part evaluates to 1 for free voxels and 2 for occupied voxels
174  if (((int)octree->isNodeOccupied(*it) + 1) & render_mode_mask)
175  {
176  // check if current voxel has neighbors on all sides -> no need to be displayed
177  bool all_neighbors_found = true;
178 
179  octomap::OcTreeKey key;
180  octomap::OcTreeKey n_key = it.getIndexKey(); // key of the maximum-depth voxel at the current voxel corner
181 
182  // determine indices of potentially neighboring voxels for depths < maximum tree depth
183  // +/-1 at maximum depth, -1 and +depth_difference on other depths
184  int diff_base = 1 << (octree->getTreeDepth() - it.getDepth());
185  int diff[2] = { -1, diff_base };
186 
187  // cells with adjacent faces can occlude a voxel, iterate over the cases x,y,z (idxCase) and +/- (diff)
188  for (unsigned int idx_case = 0; idx_case < 3; ++idx_case)
189  {
190  int idx_0 = idx_case % 3;
191  int idx_1 = (idx_case + 1) % 3;
192  int idx_2 = (idx_case + 2) % 3;
193 
194  for (int i = 0; all_neighbors_found && i < 2; ++i)
195  {
196  key[idx_0] = n_key[idx_0] + diff[i];
197  // if rendering is restricted to treeDepth < maximum tree depth inner nodes with distance step_size can
198  // already occlude a voxel
199  for (key[idx_1] = n_key[idx_1] + diff[0] + 1; all_neighbors_found && key[idx_1] < n_key[idx_1] + diff[1];
200  key[idx_1] += step_size)
201  {
202  for (key[idx_2] = n_key[idx_2] + diff[0] + 1; all_neighbors_found && key[idx_2] < n_key[idx_2] + diff[1];
203  key[idx_2] += step_size)
204  {
205  octomap::OcTreeNode* node = octree->search(key, octree_depth_);
206 
207  // the left part evaluates to 1 for free voxels and 2 for occupied voxels
208  if (!(node && ((((int)octree->isNodeOccupied(node)) + 1) & render_mode_mask)))
209  {
210  // we do not have a neighbor => break!
211  all_neighbors_found = false;
212  }
213  }
214  }
215  }
216  }
217 
218  display_voxel |= !all_neighbors_found;
219  }
220 
221  if (display_voxel)
222  {
223  rviz::PointCloud::Point new_point;
224 
225  new_point.position.x = it.getX();
226  new_point.position.y = it.getY();
227  new_point.position.z = it.getZ();
228 
229  float cell_probability;
230 
231  switch (octree_color_mode)
232  {
233  case OCTOMAP_Z_AXIS_COLOR:
234  setColor(new_point.position.z, min_z, max_z, colorFactor_, &new_point);
235  break;
236  case OCTOMAP_PROBABLILTY_COLOR:
237  cell_probability = it->getOccupancy();
238  new_point.setColor((1.0f - cell_probability), cell_probability, 0.0);
239  break;
240  default:
241  break;
242  }
243 
244  // push to point vectors
245  unsigned int depth = it.getDepth();
246  point_buf[depth - 1].push_back(new_point);
247 
248  ++point_count;
249  }
250  }
251  }
252 
253  for (size_t i = 0; i < octree_depth_; ++i)
254  {
255  double size = octree->getNodeSize(i + 1);
256 
257  cloud_[i]->clear();
258  cloud_[i]->setDimensions(size, size, size);
259 
260  cloud_[i]->addPoints(&point_buf[i].front(), point_buf[i].size());
261  point_buf[i].clear();
262  }
263 }
264 } // namespace moveit_rviz_plugin
